document.full_text: nasdaq omx group and deutsche boerse are wooing major nyse euronext shareholders, as both exchanges stand by their bids for the big board parent and dig in for a drawn-out battle.
document.title: nasdaq, d.boerse eye shareholders in nyse battle
lines_and_colors: nasdaq omx group and deutsche boerse are wooing major nyse euronext shareholders, as both exchanges stand by their bids for the big board parent and dig in for a drawn-out battle.
